articles.author: Samantha Subin, Brian Evans
articles.title: Stocks tumble on Friday, notching weekly losses, as traders' rate hike fears return: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: All three major averages finished lower for the week, with the Dow wrapping its worst weekly performance since March.
articles.content:
Stocks fell on Friday, and finished lower for the week, as Wall Street struggled to shake off fears that the Federal Reserve may start hiking rates again later this month.
The S&P 500 lost 0.29%… [+1770 chars]
